Event.name: Come_down_with
Event.definition:
<def-root>A Protagonist comes to suffer from a Disease, often implicitly acquired from a Source.
<ex>She <t>got</t> the measles .</ex> <ex>The virus when <t>acquired</t> from environmental sources is often less severe .</ex> <ex>I 'm afraid I 've <t>come down</t> with a cold .</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Source
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individual or environmental reservoir of a <fen>Disease</fen> that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> was exposed to.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> contracts the <fen>Disease</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The location at which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> contracts the <fen>Disease</fen>. It is different from the <fen>Source</fen> (usually marked with "from") in that it does not necessarily mean that it was contact with the <fen>Place</fen> that actually led to infection.
<ex>He <t>caught</t> a cold <fex name="Place">in Hawaii</fex> .</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the event as a whole in comparison to other events ("the same way") or in terms of details of the event that affect the overall event ("rapidly").</def-root>

lexUnit.name: come down (with).v
lexUnit.definition: FN: begin to suffer from a disease.

lexUnit.name: contract.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: begin to suffer from a disease.

lexUnit.name: acquire.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: begin to suffer from a disease.

lexUnit.name: catch.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: suffer the transfer of (a pathogen) from some source.
